Date/time selection qualifier

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
1ST First value within rangedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
ALL All values within the rangedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
LST Last value within the rangedeprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
REV All values within the range returned in reverse chronological order (This is the default if not otherwise specified.)deprecatedadded v2.2, removed after v2.6
